reviews.review: ho tante ore di gioco , lo consiglio , gioco originale .
We're doing a great job so far
um bom jogo para se jogar com os amiguinhos !

Game is not balanced at all.

Matchmaking is nonexistent or broken, meaning veteran players get paired with beginners, on both sides.

Developers refuse to listen to the community, "fixing" things that are not broken and leaving other broken things for months on end. Some bugs are simply accepted now because developers don't even know how to fix them. Spaghetti code at its finest.

Outside communication pretty much trivializes the game for survivors. If you play with competent friends, killers will look like fools most of the time.

The community is as toxic as it gets. If you play survivor, you'll get facecamped and watch your character die slowly. If you play killer, four people will teabag and click their flashlights at your face every single game.

Idiotic quests for the battle pass makes playing the game a goddamn nightmare, since people will try to do stupid stuff and ruin your game, just so they can complete it.

Sometimes someone crashes before the game and you'll get locked out of the matchmaking.

There's not even a resolution option. You got to open an .ini file to fix this.

I'll be honest with you. This game is addictive, but it is NOT worth your time. It is NOT fun. If you find this on sale, go for it. Otherwise, move on.
Mister Putin doesn't play dead by daylight, lol.
Es un buen juego, te hace sufrir lo suficiente como para decirlo

Great, fun game. Whether you're alone or playing with friends, it's always a thrill. While there are still a few glitched mechanics, and some characters are clearly better than others, it is still always fun to boot up this game to hunt or be hunted.

okay. it's been a while.

almost 6k hours in and i got something to say

DO NOT PLAY IT

i am immune to gambling and majority of addictions, this game has none of those too
but what i got addicted to is sense of danger that triggers my Stockholm syndrome and long suppressed sadistic tendencies from the times when i got bullied in schools(i've changed like 7).

the game is a very cool concept. the characters are cool(both original and licensed). visually to me it's satisfying too. NOT PAY TO WIN AT ALL. 0 PAY TO WIN. 
BUT
YOU WILL WASTE MONEY ON IT FOR SKINS BECAUSE WELL BECAUSE

however, the issue is the DEVELOPERS and COMMUNITY MANAGERS. 
they're completely detached from community, only listen to people who suck up and sugartalk. they ignore dedicated players and punish content creators who speak up about issues.
i'm not saying they have to listen to all the criticism but there is no communication about YEARS-long issues and requests from dedicated player(it took them 5.5 years to actually add acceptable reward for reaching highest ranks but still nothing for "player level". i'm not even talking about hard things to solve like balance).
but what they do listen to is bs like "Bubba wanted a special mask so he tunnelled and targeted a specific survivor boo hoo bhvr do something" AND BOY DID BVHR DELIVER. they just removed the masks completely and gave us 6k shards(ingame currency for which you can buy not even 1 piece of decent cosmetic. i get 6k shards faster than whatever time it took me to actually get Bubba's masks).
if you watch any live stream with devs you will see how they don't even know what they're talking about, constant lying too in smallest things. overall BHVR has so many incompetent people working for them. ESPECIALLY community managers. they can't even address and apologize for things(for example after they've implemented dedicated servers, some regions were cut off from playing and were forced to use VPN for 7 months and this was never even publicly talked about despite all the complaints on forums, reddit, steam and twitter).

needless to say i'm autistic and this game became my special interest and i really wish i could quit it but it won't happen until my autism chooses something else to obsess over.
